full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GTOR ZOR DANG BZLOG BSGYUR MDOS GLUD SOGS KYI NYES PA MI 'BYUNG BA'I THABS ZAB MO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI RGYUD LDAN BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI PHYAG BZHES MAN NGAG BZHIN DU GRONG CHOG MKHAN BLO GSAR BA SLOB MA RNAMS LA PHAN 'DOGS PA'I BSAM PA'I CHO 'PHRUL SMON LAM CHEN MO DGE BAS DUS SU BSAM 'PHEL GLING DU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSAM GTAN GYIS BRIS PA'O, ,RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
